person.persName: Lewis Lay (Union County, Tennessee, farm hand and Private (U.S.A.).)

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farm hand and soldier. Tennessee native. Son of William Lay and Sarah Lay. Resident in Grainger County, Tennessee in 1850. Farm hand in Union County, Tennessee in 1860. Mustered in as private] in the 1st Regiment Tennessee Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) on April 2, 1863. Juror in the State V. William B. Chapman in May 1861.
